com.facebook.buck.cxx

Class Depfiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cxx.Depfiles

  • public class Depfiles
extends Object
    Specialized parser for .d Makefiles emitted by gcc -MD.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Depfiles.Depfile 
      static class  Depfiles.HeaderVerificationException 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Path> parseAndVerifyDependencies(BuckEventBus eventBus, ProjectFilesystem filesystem, HeaderPathNormalizer headerPathNormalizer, HeaderVerification headerVerification, Path sourceDepFile, Path inputPath, Path outputPath, DependencyTrackingMode dependencyTrackingMode)
      Reads and processes .dep file produced by a cxx compiler.
      static Depfiles.Depfile parseDepfile(Readable readable)
      Parses the input as a .d Makefile as emitted by gcc -MD and returns the (target, [dep, dep2, ...]) inside.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • parseDepfile

        public static Depfiles.Depfile parseDepfile(Readable readable)
                                     throws IOException
        Parses the input as a .d Makefile as emitted by gcc -MD and returns the (target, [dep, dep2, ...]) inside.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • parseAndVerifyDependencies

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Path> parseAndVerifyDependencies(BuckEventBus eventBus,
                                                                                       ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
                                                                                       HeaderPathNormalizer headerPathNormalizer,
                                                                                       HeaderVerification headerVerification,
                                                                                       Path sourceDepFile,
                                                                                       Path inputPath,
                                                                                       Path outputPath,
                                                                                       DependencyTrackingMode dependencyTrackingMode)
                                                                                throws IOException,
                                                                                       Depfiles.HeaderVerificationException
        Reads and processes .dep file produced by a cxx compiler.
        Parameters:
        eventBus - Used for outputting perf events and messages.
        filesystem - Used to access the filesystem and handle String to Path conversion.
        headerPathNormalizer - Used to convert raw paths into absolutized paths that can be resolved to SourcePaths.
        headerVerification - Setting for how to respond to untracked header errors.
        sourceDepFile - Path to the raw dep file
        inputPath - Path to source file input, used to skip any leading entries from -fsanitize-blacklist.
        outputPath - Path to object file output, used for stat tracking.
        dependencyTrackingMode - Setting for how a compiler works with dependencies, used to parse depfile
        Returns:
        Normalized path objects suitable for use as arguments to HeaderPathNormalizer.getSourcePathForAbsolutePath(Path).
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurs.
        Depfiles.HeaderVerificationException - if HeaderVerification error occurs and headerVerification == ERROR.
